entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
